Pre-Game Insights: Zion Williamson is out for the game against Portland due to return to competition reconditioning.
Brandon Ingram and Trey Murphy are also out for the mid-week Western Conference matchup due to left ankle sprains.
Dejounte Murray is questionable for the Pelicans with right elbow soreness and right shin contusion.
For Portland, Jerami Grant and Matisse Thybulle are out due to face contusion and right ankle injury respectively.
Deni Avdija and Donovan Clingan are questionable for Portland with right wrist sprain and rest respectively.
